lead_paragraph: President Obama, in his weekly address, asked Congress to reverse the effects of a Supreme Court ruling by imposing strict disclosure requirements.
snippet: President Obama, in his weekly address, asked Congress to reverse the effects of a Supreme Court ruling by imposing strict disclosure requirements.

headline.main: Obama Calls for Campaign Spending Disclosure
headline.seo: Obama Calls for Disclosure of Election Spending by Companies and Other Groups
headline.print_headline: Obama Calls For Disclosure Of Spending On Elections
